name: @kodekonveyor/inez-server
description: server side of knowledge representation framework

scripts.start: npm run startMongo && npm run startserver& npm run sleep
scripts.stop: npm run stopserver; npm run stopMongo
scripts.e2e: npm run start&& npm run e2etest && npm run stop
scripts.qa: tsc&&npm run build&&npm run lint &&npm run test&& npm run integrationtest&&npm run e2e&& npm run mutate
scripts.publish:patch: npm run qa && npm version patch && git push origin develop --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:minor: npm run qa && npm version minor && git push origin develop --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:major: npm run qa && npm version major && git push origin develop --tags && npm publish --access=public
